value.0:
The following book was actually comprised of a series of royal decrees and official proclamations.

--

Queen-Monarch Zaranda Star Rhindaun and the Monarch's Privy Council have decreed:

All monstrous races must be driven from the Crown-Lands and all Tethyrian holdings by 1370 DR.

Monstrous races include, but are not limited to:
-Orcs, Goblins, Hobgoblins, Bugbears
-Ogres
-Trolls
-Driders
-Draconic Creatures
-Jellies, Puddings and other Slimes

Endorsed by: Queen Zaranda Star Rhindaun, King Haedrak III, Duchess Vajira Valmeyjar, Duke Alaric Hembreon, Duke Tardeth Llanistaph, Duke Llachior Blackthorn, Duke Inselm Hhune, Duchess Marilyn Haresdown, Duke Mirthal Aendryr, Duke Allain Kevanarial, Lord Lyrminor Vineshigh, Lord Rauthomyr, Lord Vorn Galmrin, Lady Simonne Whitebrow, and Archdruid Arkaneus Silvermane.

--

By order of the Helmite Inquisition, these additional creatures shall receive a bounty to be rewarded by the Crown.
-Hungry Undead
-Restless Undead
-Liches
-Werewolves
-Devils and Demons
-Extra-planar beasts of malicious intent

Endorsed by: Toram Gyvvalstorm, High Watcher and Abbeymaster of Chevangard of Survale Ford.

--

By order of the Council of Noromath, bounties will be offered for the following offenders of the law:

-Bandits
-Blighters
-Deserters
-Cyricists
-Occultists

Endorsed by: Lord Knight Iybn El Agis, Lord Baron Wasaam Dajani, Lord Baron Malakai Alzhier, Lord Baron Arthur Sanderson,  Commander Gerard Dulain, Steward Mercedes Hawklin, Lady Alina Al-Kamal, Mayor Ieval Boralail, and Great Druid Rorik Greywood.
Book: By Royal Decree: Expulsion of Monstrous Races
